name: The Last Wiener
description:
In this 2 player game staring Blanche and Merguez, you will have to survive on the barbecue grill. You can push your wiennemy out of the grill and win, or push him into the flames ! Be careful, don't get burn or pushed, remember : there can be only one Wiener.

Developpers : Jérôme Labbé / Amine Nair

Graphic designer : Angélique Labbé
